validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

messages.doYouHaveQuestions: Do you have any questions? Feel free to reach out.

ReadersContent.title: Discover and explore published content
ReadersContent.text: Browse our collection of published works from authors and creators. Find new stories, articles, and content across various genres and formats.

CreatorsContent.title: Secure content development and sharing for authors
CreatorsContent.text: Upload your work to securely store it, share it selectively and privately with others, and publish and market it yourself or with help. This platform offers tenant-aware access control, multilingual support, and efficient content distribution to give your work global reach.

section.title: Secure, Fast & Responsive
section.content: This site is tenant-aware with granular role-based access control and encryption to keep your content secure and available only to designated recipients.

section.title: More Than Just Self-Publishing
section.content: This site allows both aspiring and accomplished authors to share, hone, and distribute their work, whether to a small circle of friends, agents who can help reach wider audiences, or the entire Internet, while maintaining tight control over who sees what.

section.title: That's All There Is To It!
section.content: If you've been writing in isolation and want a secure, efficient, simple, and free platform for collaborating with others in a safe way, then you've found the right place.

AboutContent.title: Secure, fast & responsive
AboutContent.text: This site is tenant-aware with granular role-based access control and encryption to keep your content secure and available only to designated receipients.

section.title: Why Cloudflare and Next.js?
section.content: Cloudflare offers robust and scalable SQL database, object storage, and other services that integrate well with Next.js' fast and priviate server-side-first approach to keep sensitive information in the cloud and away from possibly compromised devices.

section.title: Why Auth.js v5?
section.content: Auth.js v5 offers a simply and secure way for users to optionally sign in with the preferred provider, avoiding the need to create yet another Internet account.

MissionContent.title: This isn't just self-publishing
MissionContent.text: This site is about allowing both aspiring and accomplished authors to share, hone, and distribute their work, whether it's to a small circle of friends, agents who can help them get their work to the wider world, or to the entire Internet, all the while keeping tight control over who sees what.

MiddleBlockContent.title: Introduce your work quickly & effectively
MiddleBlockContent.text: This site has multilingual support along with built-in and efficient content distribution to give your work a global reach.

ContactContent.title: Contact us
ContactContent.text: This site is still under development and not quite ready for prime time, but if you're interested in knowing more and maybe getting involved, please let us know. This is not for programmers or web developers: it's for authors who don't want to use the conventional and sometimes expensive and complicated approaches to sharing their work.

ContactFormContent.title: Contact Us
ContactFormContent.text: Please fill out all the fields and then click Send Message.

ServicesContent.title: That's all there is to it!
ServicesContent.text: If you've been writing in isolation and want a secure, efficient, simple, and free platform for collaborating with others in a safe way, then you've found the right place.

PrivacyPolicyContent.intro: At Logosophe, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.
PrivacyPolicyContent.informationWeCollectIntro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
PrivacyPolicyContent.howWeUseIntro: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUseList: Send you technical notices and support messages
Communicate with you about products, services, and events
PrivacyPolicyContent.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
yourRightsList: Object to processing of your data
PrivacyPolicyContent.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

TermsOfServiceContent.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms") carefully before using the Logosophe service.
TermsOfServiceContent.acceptanceText: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
TermsOfServiceContent.useOfServiceText: Our service is designed to help authors securely store, share, and publish their work. You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.
TermsOfServiceContent.userAccountsText: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password.
TermsOfServiceContent.contentOwnershipText: You retain all rights to your content. By uploading content to our service, you grant us a license to store, display, and distribute your content as necessary to provide the service.
prohibitedActivitiesList: Use the service for any illegal purpose
Violate any laws in your jurisdiction
Infringe upon the rights of others
Interfere with the proper working of the service
TermsOfServiceContent.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.
TermsOfServiceContent.changesToTermsText: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page.
TermsOfServiceContent.contactInformationText: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

workflow.title: Workflows
workflow.description: Collaborate with your team on workflows and track progress
workflow.createWorkflowDescription: Start a new collaborative workflow with your team
workflow.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the workflow purpose and goals
workflow.participantsDescription: Select team members to include in this workflow and assign their roles
workflow.mediaFilesDescription: Select media files to include in this workflow (optional)
workflow.aboutWorkflowsDescription: Workflows allow you to share media files with team members and collaborate on projects. Once created, participants can view the shared media and reply with their contributions. The workflow continues until you mark it as complete.
workflow.noWorkflows: No workflows yet. Create one to get started.
